::Striker::

Striker shruggs, putting Rhinox into a CR chamber.

"He'll be fine," he says, looking at Spears. He turns his head sharply as a 
hallway collapses, panels smashing into the floor, "The Ark, on the other 
hand, is dying. That blast took it over the edge."
